content: Based on the information provided, a fork type AGV would be a more suitable option for transporting goods and materials inside the pharmaceutical factory. The fork type AGV is well-suited for transporting heavy loads (maximum 700 kg) over long distances (maximum length of 200 meters) in a relatively narrow corridor (2 meters). Additionally, the fork type AGV has the ability to maneuver large and heavy loads, making it a good choice for this application.
